availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles D. Hillman (Caldwell Co, Ky, surgeon dentist and second lieutenant (U.S.A.))

body.p: Princeton, Kentucky, surgeon dentist and soldier. Native of Prussia. Married to Amelia Hillman. Father of Fannie Hillman and Corrina Hillman. Mustered into the United States Army as lieutenant on July 29, 1862. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry as second lieutenant and recruiting officer in August 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 117.
KYR-0002-222-0046.
